CustomField.description:
02/10/2022 - updated per Backlog ItemV: Item-3116
9/27/18 - Per Kevin at BW, this field was created for CEI or Console Cases. This field is used as its part of the criteria used within a console list view to alert reps of emails they have received on cases they thought were closed. Its specifically used on the Case Views and not on a page layout.
CustomField.label: Unread New Email
